verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I believe in Jesus. I believe He is the Son of God. I believe He died and rose again. I believe He paid for us all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And I believe that He’s here now, Standing in our midst. Here with the power to heal us, And the grace to forgive.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We believe in Jesus. We believe You are the Son of God. We believe You died and rose again. We believe You paid for us all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And We believe that You’re here now, Standing in our midst. Here with the power to heal us, And the grace to forgive.{/lang-eng}
